Title: Relates to establishing reporting duties of law enforcement agencies with respect to police misconduct allegations and outcomes
Summary: Relates to establishing reporting duties of law enforcement agencies with respect to police misconduct allegations and outcomes; requires the division of criminal justice services to establish and maintain on its official website a public, searchable database of alleged infractions and police misconduct complaints.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing reporting duties of law enforcement agencies with respect to police misconduct allegations and outcomes
